post.title: 주소 검색 라이브러리 react-daum-postcode
post.description: react-daum-postcode는 React 환경에서 Daum 우편번호 검색 서비스를 간편하게 이용할 수 있는 라이브러리 패키지입니다.

`,(0,n.jsxs)(e.p,{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.code,{children:"DaumPostcodeEmbed"})," \uCEF4\uD3EC\uB10C\uD2B8\uB97C \uC0AC\uC6A9\uD558\uC5EC, \uC6B0\uD3B8\uBC88\uD638 \uAC80\uC0C9 \uC11C\uBE44\uC2A4\uB97C \uC784\uBCA0\uB4DC \uBC29\uC2DD\uC73C\uB85C \uC0AC\uC6A9\uD560 \uC218 \uC788\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4."]}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.pre,{children:(0,n.jsx)(e.code,{className:"language-jsx",children:`import React from "react";\r
import DaumPostcodeEmbed from "react-daum-postcode";\r
\r
const Postcode = () => {\r
  const handleComplete = (data) => {\r
    let fullAddress = data.address;\r
    let extraAddress = "";\r
\r
    // \uB3C4\uB85C\uBA85 \uC8FC\uC18C\uC5D0 \uBC95\uC815\uB3D9/\uBC95\uC815\uB9AC/\uAC74\uBB3C\uBA85\uC774 \uC788\uB294 \uACBD\uC6B0 \uC804\uCCB4 \uC8FC\uC18C\uB85C \uD569\uCCD0\uC8FC\uB294 \uACFC\uC815\r
    if (data.addressType === "R") {\r
      if (data.bname !== "") {\r
        extraAddress += data.bname;\r
      }\r
      if (data.buildingName !== "") {\r
        extraAddress +=\r
          extraAddress !== "" ? \`, \${data.buildingName}\` : data.buildingName;\r
      }\r
      fullAddress += extraAddress !== "" ? \` (\${extraAddress})\` : "";\r
    }\r
\r
    console.log(fullAddress); // e.g. '\uC11C\uC6B8 \uC131\uB3D9\uAD6C \uC655\uC2ED\uB9AC\uB85C2\uAE38 20 (\uC131\uC218\uB3D91\uAC00)'\r
  };\r
\r
  return <DaumPostcodeEmbed onComplete={handleComplete} />;\r
};
`})}),`
